name: Text Anything
description: Text Anything is an SMS and WhatsApp marketing platform that helps businesses drive revenue through conversational messaging, 1-way alerts, QR-based lead capture, and more. The platform supports broadcast messaging, drip campaigns, opt-in collection, and multi-agent inboxes.

children.name: SMS Marketing
children.description: SMS marketing product with a built-in contact manager, drip campaigns, broadcast messaging, opt-in keyword-based capture, QR-code generation, and compliance tools like opt-out handling.

children.name: Starter Plan - SMS
children.description: Supports up to 10,000 contacts, 2,000 SMS/day, 3 QR campaigns, and standard automation features.

children.name: Growth Plan - SMS
children.description: Supports 100,000 contacts, 25,000-50,000 SMS/day, 10 QR campaigns, advanced automation, and integrations.

children.name: Premium Plan - SMS
children.description: Supports 750,000 contacts, 100,000+ SMS/day, 100 QR campaigns, with lowest per-message cost and white-glove support.

children.name: WhatsApp Marketing
children.description: Meta-verified WhatsApp marketing platform offering bulk and automated messaging, green tick verification, quick replies, conversational templates, and support for media-rich campaigns.

children.name: Free Trial - WhatsApp
children.description: 2-week trial with 1,000 contact limit, access to full WhatsApp features, no credit card needed, includes API onboarding.

children.name: Paid Plan - WhatsApp
children.description: Supports 10,000 to 750,000 contacts, Meta tier-based daily messaging limits, includes opt-in flows, API access, auto-replies, and broadcast management.

children.name: Salesforce Products
children.description: Native Salesforce apps to send SMS and WhatsApp messages directly from within the Salesforce CRM, with automation and workflow integration.

children.name: Text Anything for Salesforce
children.description: All-in-one app to send SMS and WhatsApp messages from Salesforce using pre-built automation, native components, and standard pricing.

children.name: Text Anything for Salesforce + Twilio
children.description: Version of the Salesforce app allowing businesses to use their own Twilio number, infrastructure, and billing while accessing all messaging features.
